channel.title: Adding commands to emote bar?
channel.description:
Well on edited servers, most of them have teleport commands on the emote bar, I was wondering how I can add this to my server? Also I was wondering if anyone could tell me the code for the bank and char in the emote bar.
Any help will be greatly appreciated.
Thanks, Sithling.
P.S I'm using TestScape source.

item.title: Adding commands to emote bar?
item.dc:creator: @Sithling Sithling
item.description:
@Sithling wrote:

Lol thanks so much.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands to emote bar?
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

find the case number for the emote tab you want to teleport you,

then do this:

case ####:
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
sendMessage(“you eat jizz”);
break;

Read full topic
